pushData(String) - Method in class com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.Database
Pushes data to the remote database.

pushData() - Method in class com.wolvencraft.yasp.LocalSession
Performs an operation to push the locally stored data to the database.
Synchronization is performed in the following order: Generic player data Blocks Items PVP deaths PVE deaths Other deaths Any active hooks Fetch player totals
pushPlayerData() - Static method in class com.wolvencraft.yasp.DataCollector
Forces the plugin to synchronize the player data to the database.
If the player is not online, removes the session after the synchronization is complete.
pushStaticData() - Method in class com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync.ServerStatistics
